items.title: Idea and post nesting
items.description: Idea and posts nested within circles

items.title: Activity Analysis
items.description: This visualisation shows the activity of a Conversation over time.

items.title: Conversation network
items.description: This visualisation display a network graph.

items.title: Social network
items.description: This visualisation display a social graph based on a given network graph.

items.title: Contribution Stream
items.description: This visualisations shows item creation over time for the various item types.

items.title: Idea Attention Map
items.description: This visualisation shows a Conversation nested inside circles with colors denoting attention distribution across the contributions.

items.title: Post Attention Map
items.description: This visualisation shows a Conversation nested inside circles with colors denoting attention distribution across the contributions.

items.title: Activity Bias
items.description: This visualisation clusters contributions based on similar activity patterns.

items.title: Contribution River
items.description: This visualisations shows item creation over time for the various item types.

items.title: Community Interest Network
items.description: This visualisation display a network graph of the connected posts in the Conversation showing the community interest in that post by ball size and colour changes.

items.title: Sub-Communities Network
items.description: This visualisation display a network graph of the connected posts in the Conversation. It shows sub-community clustering within the Conversation where the nodes representing the posts change shape and colour depending on their sub-community.

items.title: Sub-Communities Network
items.description: This visualisation display a network graph of the connected posts in the Conversation. It shows sub-community clustering within the Conversation where the nodes representing the posts change shape and colour depending on their sub-community.

items.title: Conversation Sunburst Network by Branch
items.description: This visualisation display a network graph of the connected nodes in the Conversation as a layered sunburst coloured by branch of the Conversation.

items.title: Conversation Treemap
items.description: This visualisation displays a treemap of the Conversation. The colours of the squares change to represent sibling groupings. This version of the treemap is good for shallower trees.

items.title: Conversation Treemap - Top down
items.description: This visualisation displays a treemap of the Conversation. The first two levels of the tree are exposed initially and then you drill down by clicking the labelled boxes. This version of the treemap is good for deeper trees.
